post:
Hi Folks,

I am doing a limited run of remaining space in the UK before I switch to pure SSD nodes.

50 available, when it is gone it is gone.

Package:
<pre>
2 vCPU Cores (E5-2640v4)
6 GB Ram (DDR 4)
1 GB vSWAP
40 GB Disk (SAS Raid 10 + 2 x 512GB SSD's running under cachecade)
2000 GB Bandwidth
1 x IPv4
1 x /64 IPv6 Subnet
</pre>

<a href="https://clients.inceptionhosting.com/cart.php?a=add&pid=172">ORDER LINK</a>

No coupon codes needed

Prices: 
<pre>
€3.00 p/month
€9.00 p/quarter
€18.00 for 6 months
€30.00 p/year
</pre>


<a href="http://lg1.inceptionhosting.com">LOOKING GLASS</a>

Once they are sold out 1 order will be randomly selected to win a Lenovo tab 3, 7 Inch.

<img src="http://argos.scene7.com/is/image/Argos/5538120_R_Z001A?fmt=pjpg" />

The tablet will be shipped for Free anywhere in Europe or the USA, options will be given if shipping to your location is prohibitive, alternatively €100 account credit can be claimed instead.

If 50 do not sell I will carry over the purchases to the next special offer and pick a winner then.

Other <a href="https://clients.inceptionhosting.com/cart.php?gid=27">UK</a> and <a href="https://clients.inceptionhosting.com/cart.php?gid=25">Phoenix USA</a> KVM options available, please feel free to ask about custom plans or discounts in these locations.

Thanks.

Anthony.
